page.title: 20Ballingry: Credits
page.content:
This D-block was surveyed by pupils of Rooms 8,9,10,11,and 12 at Benarty Primary School, Ballingry. Although several of them have been named individually at the ends of text pages, many more were involved in one capacity or another and deserve credit for their hard work and helpful suggestions.
The work was co-ordinated by Miss A McBride, with valuable assistance from other teachers, in particular Mrs J Martin, Mrs M Lyall, Mr G Gibson, Mrs E Gow and Mr S Napier.
Thanks are also due to some parents and other members of the community who helped in small or large ways to gather information.
